svg.text: Over the years, I’ve trained a number of data scientists. While not all of them have gone
on to become world-changing data ninja rockstars, I’ve left them all better data scientists
than I found them. And I’ve grown to believe that anyone who has some amount of
mathematical aptitude and some amount of programming skill has the necessary raw
materials to do data science. All she needs is an inquisitive mind, a willingness to work
hard, and this book. Hence this book.
